# Keys for Notification UserInfo Dictionary

**API Collection**

Strings that the system uses as keys in a userinfo dictionary during a file handle notification.

## Constants

- **NSFileHandleNotificationFileHandleItem**: A key in the userinfo dictionary in a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNotification/Name-swift.struct/NSFileHandleConnectionAccepted] notification.
- **NSFileHandleNotificationDataItem**: A key in the userinfo dictionary in a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileHandle/readCompletionNotification] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNotification/Name-swift.struct/NSFileHandleReadToEndOfFileCompletion].
- **NSFileHandleNotificationMonitorModes**: Currently unused.

## Constants

- **Exception Names**: Constant that defines the name of a file operation exception.
